data.description: Back to Job PostingFull Stack Software Engineer Intern - Summer 2026 Internshipcurrent step 1 of 8step 2 of 8step 3 of 8step 4 of 8step 5 of 8step 6 of 8step 7 of 8step 8 of 8Create AccountPassword Requirements:An alphabetic characterA lowercase characterA numeric characterA special characterAn uppercase characterA minimum of 8 charactersEmail Address*Password*Verify New Password*Privacy policyNote: You must AGREE to proceed.APAC Privacy PolicyAustralia & New Zealand Privacy StatementBrazil Práticas de PrivacidadeChina Privacy PolicyEMEA Privacy StatementJapan Privacy PolicyKorea Privacy PolicyLatin America Políticas de Privacidad United States of America Vietnam Privacy Policy   As of 25 May 2018, Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation – “GDPR”) has been applied.This document details the purpose and rules of processing of personal data by Motorola Solutions Group and your rights with regard to that data processing.Motorola Solutions’ Global Data Privacy Policy can be found here.INFORMATION ON PROCESSING PERSONAL DATAI. PERSONAL DATA CONTROLLERMotorola Solutions Inc. (500 W. Monroe, Chicago, IL 60661 USA) is the data controller for global recruitment portals and HR management programs related to internal administrative, operational, reporting and data collection and storage purposes. The company indicated in the recruitment advertisement (“Company” or “Employer”) is the administrator for recruiting locally, as well as all data transferred from Motorola Solutions Inc. and is managing the Employer's recruitment. A list of Motorola companies with address information is available via the following link. To exercise one or more of your rights, please complete the form found here:To ask a question about these rights or about our Processing of your Personal Data, you can contact us via the following address: privacy1@motorolasolutions.comOur Global Privacy Policy is available here.II. PURPOSES AND LEGAL BASIS FOR PROCESSING Purpose of personal data processing:1. Recruitment Legal basis for processing:Taking steps to conclude a contract (Art. 6 paragraph 1 point b of the GDPR; in specific situations, Art. 9 paragraph 2 point b of the GDPR); fulfillment of a legal obligation (Art. 6 paragraph 1 point c of the GDPR in connection with Art. 221 of the Labor Code)2. Determination, investigation or defense against claimsLegal basis for processing:Implemented related to the Company's legitimate interests (Art. 6 paragraph 1 point f of the GDPR)3. Transferring/sharing personal data within the corporate group for internal administrative purposes, including reporting within the Motorola Solutions Inc. group.Legal basis for processing:Implemented related to the Company's legitimate interests (Art. 6 paragraph 1 point f of the GDPR)4. For the purpose and to the extent specified in the consent to the processing of personal data, e.g. Consent for future recruitmentLegal basis for processing:consent (art. 6 paragraph 1 point a of the GDPR or Art. 9 paragraph 2 point a of the GDPR)III. RECIPIENTS OF PERSONAL DATAPersonal data may be shared with the following recipients or categories of recipients:1. public authorities and entities performing public tasks or acting on behalf of public authorities, to the extent and for the purposes that result from the provisions of law;2. related entities within the Motorola Solutions Inc. group. You can find a list of related entities with whom we share data under Binding Corporate Rules here;3. entities providing the controller with IT, legal, background check, residence legalization, employment services in the Republic of Poland, as well as entities supporting the controller in conducting recruitment processes, including, or entities organizing competitions / training courses as well as conducting competency tests.IV. TRANSFER OF PERSONAL DATA OUTSIDE THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AREA. Personal data is shared with entities in the Motorola Solutions Inc. group, of which the Company is a member, including countries outside the European Economic Area, based on our Binding Corporate Rules. The  list of Motorola Solutions Inc. group’s entities can be found here.The Danish Data Protection Agency, Datatilsynet approved our EEA BCR-C’s. For the full text of our EEA BCR-C’s, click here. For a link to the BCR-C’s appendices, click here.The Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO) approved our UK BCR-C’s. For the full text of our UK BCR-C’s, click here.  For a link to the BCR-C’s appendices, click here.Personal data may also be transferred to entities cooperating with Motorola Solutions Group entities in their home countries, located outside the European Economic Area, providing IT, competence evaluation and background services (Competency evaluation - Codility Limited, 107 Cheapside, EC2V 6DN London, United Kingdom; Background Check services  - Sterling Infosystems, Inc., 1 State Street Plaza, 24th Floor New York, NY 10004 and Venovox Sdn. Bhd.,100-6-029, Block J, Jaya One 72A, Jalan Universiti 46200 PJ. Petaling Jaya, 46200 Malaysia; Legalization of stay Infolet, Zygmunta Miłkowskiego 3, 30-349 Kraków and PT Outsource Indonesia (OI), Gedung Apotik, Jl. Bendungan Hilir No.78, RT.5/RW.3, Bend. Hilir, Kecamatan Tanah Abang, Kota Jakarta Pusat, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 10210, Indonesia and Icon Trans Sdn Bhd., 37, Jalan Perniagaan Vorteks 5, Pusat Perniagaan Vorteks, 14100 Simpang Ampat, Penang, KPMG Tax Services Sdn. Bhd.,10th Floor, KPMG Tower, No.8, First Avenue, Bandar Utama, 47800 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia) on the basis of data processing agreements containing appropriate transfer mechanisms.V. PROCESSING PERIODS FOR PERSONAL DATAPersonal data is processed for the period necessary for the implementation of the objectives indicated in II paragraph.For those who were not recruited, their personal data collected within the recruitment process are processed for the period of the statute of limitations applicable to a given country. For those who have consented to participate in future recruitment processes and have withdrawn this consent, their data is no longer processed for recruitment purposes, but is stored for possible claims for the following periods:Denmark, Norway, Sweden - 6 months;France, Greece, Spain - 2 years;Belgium, Italy, Ireland, Netherlands, Austria, UK, Czech Republic, Germany, Romania, Turkey, Ukraine - 1 year.With regards to Poland, Portugal and Lithuania: for those who are not hired and have not consented to participate in other/future recruitment processes, their personal data collected within the recruitment process is processed for the period of the statute of limitations applicable in each of the countries:Poland - 3 years;Portugal - 6 years;Lithuania - 10 years.For those who have consented to take part in other/future recruitment processes, their personal data is processed for this purpose for a period of 2 years or until the consent is withdrawn.VI. RIGHTS OF THE DATA SUBJECT1. right of access to personal data, including the right to obtain a copy of such data;2. right to request rectification of personal data;3. right to request erasure of personal data (known as “the right to be forgotten”);4. right to request restriction of personal data processing;5. right to data portability; 6. right to withdraw consent to the processing of personal data. Withdrawal of consent does not affect the lawfulness of the data processing carried out on the basis of consent expressed before its withdrawal;7. right to file a complaint with the supervisory authority.VII. INFORMATION ON THE REQUIREMENT/VOLUNTARY PROVISION OF DATA1. Provision of data indicated in the provisions of the labor law is necessary to participate in the recruitment process.2. Provision of other personal data is voluntary. For information about the purpose and rules of processing of personal data by Motorola Solutions as well as local privacy policies in other language versions please click below:  France Protection de Données    Polska Polityka Ochrony Prywatnosci  Россия политика о персональных данных  טפסי הצהרת סודיות בישראל‎  Deutschland Datenschutz   Informazione sul trattamento dei dati personaliInformação sobre o tratamento de dados pessoais   Πληροφοριεσ για τη μεταποιηση των προσωπικων δεδομενων  Información sobre el tratamiento de datos personales     Read MoreYes, I have read and consent to the terms and conditionsCreate AccountAlready have an account?Sign InForgot your password?Enter website.
